parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.description: ID of a process

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: ID of field needs lookup data

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: This is the specific page number of an item list. The page number can be specified as 1, 2, 3, etc.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items that can be listed in a page. It can be assigned any integer.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search filter string

post.description: This endpoint lets you submit a specific item at workflow step in your process.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: Your unique <<glossary:Instance ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: activity_instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Step Instance ID>> is the unique identifier for a particular step, and is a mandatory parameter.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the progress of a specific item in your process.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Process ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an attachment file to your process' form field. You can add an attachment in the following file formats - .pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Process ID>> is a unique identifier for each process, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: activity_instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Step Instance ID>> is the unique identifier for a particular step, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds a new attachment to your process form field.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload attachment files to a table in your process form. You can add an attachment in the following file formats - .pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Process ID>> is a unique identifier for each process, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: activity_instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Step Instance ID>> is the unique identifier for a particular step, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each row of a table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each column of a table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds new attachments to a table in your process form.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an image file to your process' form field. You can add an image in the following file formats - .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, or .gif. Only the Flow Admin can invoke this API.

parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id

parameters.name: instance_id

parameters.name: activity_instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Step Instance ID>> is the unique identifier for a particular step, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds a new image file to your process form field.

parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Process ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: Your unique <<glossary:Instance ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request deletes the process item successfully.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an attachment file to your process' form field. You can add an attachment in the following file formats - .pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4. Only the Flow Admin can invoke this API.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Process ID>> is a unique identifier for each process, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds a new attachment to your process form field.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload attachment files to a table in your process form. You can add an attachment in the following file formats - .pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4. Only Flow Admins can invoke this API.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Process ID>> is a unique identifier for each process, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each row of a table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each column of a table in your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds new attachments to a table in your process form.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an image file to your process' form field. You can add an image in the following file formats - .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, or .gif. Only the Flow Admin can invoke this API.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully adds a new image file to your process form field.

get.description: This endpoint lets you download an image file from your process' form field. Only the Flow Admin can invoke this API.

parameters.name: instance_id

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your process form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully downloads an image file from your process form field.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an image file to a table in your process form. You can add an image in the following file formats - .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, or .gif. Only Flow Admins can invoke this API.

get.description: This endpoint lets you download a specific attachment file from your process' form field. Only the Flow Admin can invoke this API.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Process ID>> is a unique identifier for each process, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: This is the unique <<glossary:Attachment ID>> of your attached file.

200.description: This request successfully downloads a specific attachment file from your process form field.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the list of all items from a Kissflow process. Only Process Admins can call this endpoint.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Process ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: This is the specific page number of an item list. The page number can be specified as 1, 2, 3, etc. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items that can be listed in a page. It can be assigned any integer. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request retrieves the list of all items in your process.

tags.name: Process
tags.description: Create and manage a <<glossary:Process>> in Kissflow using these API endpoints.
